answers.answer: Definitely not going to hurt your baby. Ive eaten so many pickles and pineapples lately! Sooo good!
Ohhh that sounds so gross hahaha! Enjoy your salad :P
No it won't when you crave something usely your body needs some kind of nutrition out of whatever it is you crave.. So eat away

Just high in sugar but thats all. Enjoy. You will know in the second trimester if you have gestational diabetes when they do the screen. My cravings are no better than yours. Cake and ice cream.  Im lactose intolerant so the ice cream causes me pain. Oh and cereal. I need it lol
I read somewhere that you shouldnt eat pineapple because it can cause you to go into early labor.

Eat whatever you want. And no pineapple won't cause you to go into labor. It's not like she's going to eat 10 pineapples. I ate pineapple almost every week or when we had some and I'm 28 weeks and I'm perfectly fine

question: So lately I've been craving pineapples, pickles, and candy canes, but are those three going to hurt the child? I'm only 15 weeks, very close to the 16 week mark.Fun story to go with the question: I texted my sister telling her to bring a lot of those three things and told her that I'm gonna make a salad out of it. Lol
title: Cravings, but are they bad for the baby?
